outfit_data.top: A crisp white silk blouse with a relaxed, oversized fit. The sleeves are slightly puffed and end in delicate cuffs.
outfit_data.bottom: Tailored black linen pants with a wide leg silhouette. They fall just above the ankle, showcasing your shoes.
outfit_data.shoes: Classic black pointed-toe heels crafted from luxurious satin.
outfit_data.extras: A statement piece of bold red jewelry, such as chunky earrings or a necklace.
